basics.label: Pastry Sous Chef
basics.summary: Service oriented professional looking for opportunities in pastry arts. Seeking to advance development of skills and learn more aspects of pastry arts and confections. Diploma from the Le Cordon Bleu program and vast experience utilizing business degree in a corporate environment.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Organize and run all aspects of the pastry kitchen...
highlights: Key competencies include customer relations, organization, product knowledge, Project, Power Point and Outlook.
Attention to detail, team building and positive attitude.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepare all aspects of pastry production for restaurant...

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Chocolatier for all resort nightly turn down chocolates, miscellaneous bonbons...
highlights: Attended bonbon class at Valrhona Chocolate institute in Tain l'Hermitage, France.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepare all aspects of the production of desserts, confections, ice creams, sorbets...

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Daily meals and Green Room support for a series of on-line webisodes for a cast of 75.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for improving the quality of internally developed and third party applications used by Retirement Customer Services associates for mutual fund investment systems.
highlights: Provided leadership in the development of utilizing an application for work distribution that resulted in an increased efficiency in account processing.
Liaison role between IT department and Customer Service.
